Title: Altar Egos
Plot: Michael attempts to have a one-night stand with an attorney whom he doesn't know is not only blind, but the prosecutor who is trying to put his father in jail. Also, Gob gets married on a dare, Maeby pretends to be a girl with a made up disease, and George Sr.'s admirer turns out to be an undercover SEC agent who has truly fallen for him.
GuestStars: Julia Louis-Dreyfus, James Lipton, Steve Witting, Jane Lynch, Verda Bridges, Tim Starks, Frank Whiteman, Angela Russo
